item.title: Adding mermaid shortcode to hugo theme
item.author: kucera.ja+blog@gmail.com (Jan Kučera)
item.description:
Hugo supports shortcodes, which according to documentation are

simple snippets inside your content files calling built-in or custom templates.

There are buit-ins like visualization of an instagram post, or youtube video. But there is a place for custom ones as described thoroughy here.
